definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 5:27 basket, cage (√ dub.; NH id., [[כְּלִיבָה]] Aram. kuwlbo4o0 in Lexx.; TelAm. kilubi, bird-net, cf. Zim:ZA vi. 145, 147)—abs. [[כִּכְלוּבמָלֵא]] [[עוֹף]] Je 5:27 like a cage full of birds; cstr. [[כְּלוּב]] [[קַיִץ]] Am 8:1, Am 8:2 a basket of summer furit.
